an8.88:1.1: “Atthahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagatassa bhikkhuno akankhamana upasaka appasadam pavedeyyum.
an8.88:1.3: Gihinam alabhaya parisakkati, gihinam anatthaya parisakkati, gihi akkosati paribhasati, gihi gihihi bhedeti, buddhassa avannam bhasati, dhammassa avannam bhasati, sanghassa avannam bhasati, agocare ca nam passanti.
an8.88:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, atthahi dhammehi samannagatassa bhikkhuno akankhamana upasaka appasadam pavedeyyum.
an8.88:2.1: Atthahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagatassa bhikkhuno akankhamana upasaka pasadam pavedeyyum.
an8.88:2.3: Na gihinam alabhaya parisakkati, na gihinam anatthaya parisakkati, na gihi akkosati paribhasati, na gihi gihihi bhedeti, buddhassa vannam bhasati, dhammassa vannam bhasati, sanghassa vannam bhasati, gocare ca nam passanti.
an8.88:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, atthahi dhammehi samannagatassa bhikkhuno akankhamana upasaka pasadam pavedeyyun”ti.
